key.categories.tponr: The Point Of No Return Keybinds
tooltip.tponr.health:
Player's vitality.
Increasing the level increases
health and reduces the risk of injury.
tooltip.tponr.stamina:
Player's endurance.
Increasing the level stamina.
tooltip.tponr.strength:
Player's physical strength.
Increasing the level increases
the carried weight and  damage.
tooltip.tponr.agility:
Player's motoric skills.
Increasing the level
improves movement speed.
tooltip.tponr.intelligence:
Player's intelligence.
Increasing the level increases
the power of your mind.
tooltip.tponr.luck:
Players's luck.
Increasing the level increases
the chances of finding more valuable resources.
